text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Call of Duty: Warzone and Valorant. The build quality of the HP Omen X 17-ap010nr 17.3" FHD IPS GTX 1070 8 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Apex Legends. The build quality of the HP Omen X 17-ap010nr 17.3" FHD IPS GTX 1070 8 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The trackpad is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HP Omen X 17-ap010nr 17.3" FHD IPS GTX 1070 8 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 in the HP Omen X 17-ap010nr 17.3" FHD IPS GTX 1070 8 GB VRAM i7-7700HQ 16 GB Memory 1 TB HDD + 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
